home.heroSubtitle: ACME Studios crafts websites and apps that are fast, secure, and globally distributed by default.
home.ctaBlockBody: We'll scope, prototype, and ship — fast!

about.title: About ACME Studios
about.intro: We're a boutique web agency focused on speed, security, and delightful UX. We build on Cloudflare — Workers for compute, D1 for data, KV for global state — so your app is close to users everywhere.
about.missionDesc: Ship world-class digital experiences with edge-native tech.
about.missionIntro: We help organizations move faster by pairing elegant design with edge-native engineering. Our goals:
about.missionGoal1: Deliver measurable performance gains for every launch.
about.missionGoal2: Build systems that are secure by default and simple to operate.
about.missionGoal3: Champion accessibility and inclusive design in all user journeys.
about.missionGoal4: Share knowledge openly to uplift the community.
about.teamDesc: Designers, engineers, and product folks who love details.

designSprints.title: Design Sprints
designSprints.desc: Rapid prototyping, user testing, and brand systems.

fullStack.title: Full-stack Apps
fullStack.desc: Hono/React on Workers with D1, KV, and Turnstile.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.desc: Headless storefronts, secure payments, blazing fast.

migrations.title: Migrations
migrations.desc: Lift-and-shift to Workers with better DX & lower latency.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.desc: Resend, Mailgun, Stripe, Notion, and more.

webDesign.title: Web Design
webDesign.desc: Modern, responsive UI/UX built with performance in mind.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.desc: Full-stack apps on Cloudflare Workers, D1, and KV.

apiIntegrations.title: API & Integrations
apiIntegrations.desc: Secure APIs, auth, and third-party integrations.

optimizationService.title: Optimization
optimizationService.desc: Caching, image pipelines, and Lighthouse tuning.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.thankYouMessage: We'll be in touch shortly. Meanwhile, check out our sample projects.
contact.service: What service are you looking for?

dashboard.title: Dashboard
